### About the ICA Political Communication Summer School

The School addresses the main theoretical and empirical questions in political communication, with a faculty lecture focus on democratic citizenship, democratic backsliding and resilience, AI, digital media and misinformation, civic engagement, and polarization. Students who are working on political communication studies are invited to apply. For themes in political communication covered by our division, see the [ICA Political Communication Division homepage](https://www.icahdq.org/group/political).


### Location

The Summer School will be taking place at the [Devonshire Hall](https://accommodation.leeds.ac.uk/residence/4/devonshire-hall),  University of Leeds (UK), between 13-17 July 2026 ([View on Google Maps](https://www.google.com/maps?q=Devonshire+Hall+University+of+Leeds))
</span>.
